Control Name: REL 4.1 Identify which kind of distributed system is required
Control Statement: Hard real-time distributed systems require responses to be given synchronously and rapidly, while soft real-time systems have a more generous time window of minutes or more for response. Oï¬„ine systems handle responses through batch or asynchronous processing. Hard real-time distributed systems have the most stringent reliability requirements.

control_attributes.Control: REL 4.1 Identify which kind of distributed system is required
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you design interactions in a distributed system to prevent failures?
